channel.title: Xisth Pk Spawn-Hybrid, Semi-oldschool PVP server!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/15bklh.png[/img][/center] [center][b]Welcome to Xisth Pk Xisth Pk is a 317 semi-spawn server, this means you can spawn all items exept shop items. Xisth Pk has a long history, We have been in the top 5 servers of 2010. The server is hosted on a strong Dedicated server to handle many players, we hope to gain many players in minimum time! We also hope to see old Xisth players back! [/b][/center]
[center]==================================================
[URL=http://www.xisthpk.com/forums]Forums![/URL] [URL=http://www.xisthpk.com/webclient.html]Play Now ![/URL] [URL=http://www.xisthpk.com/download]Download client![/URL]
==================================================[/center]
[center][B]PVP SYSTEM[/B] This system works with streaks means, when you kill someone you get 1 PKP each kill even if you are on a streak. But when you killed example 5 people you are on a killingstreak of 5, means if you die you will be rewarded with 5 PKP extra. This Means 5 kills in a row will gain you 10 PKP. Max kill streak is 15 ATM. [/center]
[center][b]-- Update Log --[/b]
- Chaotic Weapons added in pvp drops ( falador,ardounge) - Rocktails added with effect - Added Hybrid/Melee set in Quest Tab - Added working PVP system - Added Curses - Added 602 gfx/anim [/center]
[center][b]Perfect Rush and Switching[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1p9eua.gif[/img][/center]
[center][b]Home[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2qkny41.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Pk shop[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/dortec.png[/img][/center]
[center]Bank [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vjpgte.png[/img] [/center]
[center][b]spec altar ( refills special attack @ home )[/b] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/o76kxi.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Pk portal[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2w398gm.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Torva With working effects[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lk9w0w.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]PVP SYSTEM[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/24bvh50.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]::getid [name] ( easy to get the item id )[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vcap9w.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Commands[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/r1akvl.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Rocktail effect[/b] ( when you eat @ full hp ) [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2n1armr.png[/img][/center]
[center][URL=http://info.flagcounter.com/HHlM][IMG]http://s04.flagcounter.com/count/HHlM/bg_51FF2E/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_5/maxflags_20/viewers_0/labels_0/pageviews_1/flags_0/[/img][/URL][/center]

item.title: Xisth Pk Spawn-Hybrid, Semi-oldschool PVP server!
item.dc:creator: @steve55 steve55
item.description:
@steve55 wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Welcome to Xisth Pk
Xisth Pk is a 317 semi-spawn server, this means you can spawn all items exept shop items.
Xisth Pk has a long history, We have been in the top 5 servers of 2010.
The server is hosted on a strong Dedicated server to handle many players, we hope to gain many players in minimum time!
We also hope to see old Xisth players back!
[/center]

[center]==================================================

Forums!
Play Now !
Download client!

==================================================[/center]

[center]PVP SYSTEM
This system works with streaks means, when you kill someone you get 1 PKP each kill even if you are on a streak.
But when you killed example 5 people you are on a killingstreak of 5, means if you die you will be rewarded with 5 PKP extra.
This Means 5 kills in a row will gain you 10 PKP.
Max kill streak is 15 ATM.
[/center]

[center]– Update Log –

  • Chaotic Weapons added in pvp drops ( falador,ardounge)
  • Rocktails added with effect
  • Added Hybrid/Melee set in Quest Tab
  • Added working PVP system
  • Added Curses
  • Added 602 gfx/anim
    [/center]
